Author: itsunusualbut
Text: i'm so sorry to hear you're going through that right now, that sounds incredibly stressful. my heart goes out to you and i hope you are finding some way to take care of yourself right now, because it sounds like you really deserve that and could use that <3  i really really relate to what you're saying about being triggered by people pointing out weight loss. a similar thing happened to me where i went through an incredibly stressful time, accidentally lost weight, and mostly noticed because people pointed it out to me, and that just triggered my old body image issues and lead to this whole extremely negative cycle of bullshit. honestly it makes me angry because people never know what is going on in someone's life, and bc of that it's just uncalled for to comment on someone's weight, positive or negative. having gone through that really reinforced to me that i should say things like that to someone else, because i understand firsthand that it's just so so potentially triggering and just unnecessary. i'm really sorry people around you don't realize that, because i feel like it should be common courtesy and you deserve to not have to deal with that during this already hard time.  anyway, i'm just sorry that happened. i hope you find your way through this time soon, and find some relief and support
